title: English
description: We run a project house located at the South Habour District in Aarhus. All members have their own key to the house to make sure that culture creation takes place 24-7. In our project house you will find a common area, project offices, studios/ateliers and our culture venue Det 3. Rum.

sections.title: some about info
sections.text: CWe offer sparring, create non-formal learning spaces and formats and do external workshops/consulting. We have collected all our best methods, tips and tricks in our book HACK DET - Projekthåndbogen til unge kulturskabere (in Danish).

sections.title: translations of each of the category
sections.text: Frontløberne have loads of experience with project management and there are many project makers on the team, who are all talented and inspiring teachers. To us, a project isn’t just a project, but something that is rooted in a need to create change.
